comment: A sequence of extended reals, converging w.r.t. the standard topology on the complex numbers is a converging sequence w.r.t. the standard topology on the extended reals. This is non-trivial, because ` +oo ` and ` -oo ` could, in principle, be complex numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
